messages.title: THE GREEN NEW DEAL
messages.content: UNLEASHING A GREEN ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL REVOLUTION

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 100% renewable energy by 2030, Carbon tax to tackle carbon imports, Phase out nuclear power and ban fracking
Farming subsidies for transition to sustainable, environmentally-friendly land use, Urban and countryside rewilding
100,000 council houses at Passivhaus standard, Retrofit insulation into existing housing stock, Overhaul planning regulations to establish highest environmental standards
Huge expansion of cycle and foot paths, Make public transport affordable, Rationalise, electrify and expand railways, Frequent flyer levy and airport expansions halted

issues.environment: RESTORING OUR NATURE AND COUNTRYSIDE, Urban and countryside rewilding
issues.socialWelfare: DELIVERING SECURE INCOMES AND SECURE HOMES

housing.content: HOUSING: 100,000 council houses at Passivhaus standard, Retrofit insulation into existing housing stock, Overhaul planning regulations to establish highest environmental standards

leaflet.personalStatement: Will always listen and act on local concerns, Cares about the whole Cambridge Community, Works hard to protect people and planet

images.caption: Jeremy Caddick visiting the new eco-mosque on Mill Road, and with Councillor Oscar Gillespie from the Cambridge Unitarian Church
